text: The United States Hockey Hall of Fame was made in 1973. The goal was to keep the rich history of ice hockey in the United States and to honor the extraordinary contributions of select players, coaches, administrators, officials and teams. It is in Eveleth, Minnesota. There is also The United States Hockey Hall of Fame Museum. The museum keeps special items related to American hockey. ==Members== The table below shows the members of the Hall of Fame as of 2012. The name shown is how it appears in the United States Hockey Hall of Fame.
